title: Nexus Blitz, Neeko, Snowdown, and All-Star

replies.body: so, when it starts?
Should be tomorrow

lmao rookie error if you think Riot's gonna release content with the patch.

Based off their last few events we'll likely be waiting 7-12 more days.
Ah but it's fun to give false hope no?
so when does nexus blitz start?

Nexus Blitz returns until January 22, 2019, at 6:59 p.m. AEDT!

Literally the first line under the header "nexus blitz" lol

doesn't it say "until January 22, 2019"
i thought until was the time that Nexus Blitz was gonna end

Patch 8.24 Snowdown info dump (Full Thread)

Event Begins Thursday December 6th. That's when shop/missions/Nexus Blitz/everything turns on, including Your shop!

ooo
Worth noting that is more than likely EST or something similar, so for OCE it'll probably be sometime on the 7th once you account for timezones.
Will the Akali skin be as expensive as the Kai'Sa skin?

1800 tokens

no it will not as 2500 was for 6 weeks and this event is not that long plus the kai'sa one was 3 events not 1 so prob like 1000 maybe or 830 ish
